produk.nama: RM Series Modular Online UPS (25–600 kVA)

tipe.nama: RM Series Modular Online UPS (25–600 kVA)

judul.teks1: High-reliability modular UPS designed for large data centers. Features hot-swappable power modules, N+X redundancy, and high efficiency up to 95%. Compact design saves space and simplifies maintenance.

produk.nama: RM Series Rack-Mounted Modular UPS (10–200 kVA)

tipe.nama: RM Series Rack-Mounted Modular UPS (10–200 kVA)

judul.teks1: Rack-type modular UPS for medium data centers and IT rooms. Offers scalable design, 25 kVA modules, and intelligent charging management for longer battery life.

produk.nama: RM Series In-Built Battery Modular UPS (20–60 kVA)

tipe.nama: RM Series In-Built Battery Modular UPS (20–60 kVA)

judul.teks1: All-in-one modular UPS with hot-swappable batteries. Compact and easy to install, providing intelligent battery protection and simplified power expansion.

produk.nama: HT33 Series Tower Online UPS (10–500 kVA)

tipe.nama: HT33 Series Tower Online UPS (10–500 kVA)

judul.teks1: Three-phase online UPS with DSP digital control for maximum reliability. Delivers 96% efficiency, high input power factor, and low THDi. Ideal for data centers and precision equipment.

produk.nama: HT33-TX Series Tower Online UPS (10–40 kVA)

tipe.nama: HT33-TX Series Tower Online UPS (10–40 kVA)

judul.teks1: UPS with in-built isolation transformer for enhanced protection. Provides clean, stable power for critical loads in IT and industrial environments.

produk.nama: HT31 Series Tower Online UPS (10–40 kVA)

tipe.nama: HT31 Series Tower Online UPS (10–40 kVA)

judul.teks1: Compact online UPS with output PF = 1 and parallel capability up to four units. Suitable for computer rooms, servers, and communication equipment.

produk.nama: HT11 Series Tower Online UPS (1–20 kVA)

tipe.nama: HT11 Series Tower Online UPS (1–20 kVA)

judul.teks1: Single-phase UPS with high efficiency (up to 95%) and intelligent battery management. Ideal for small offices, networks, and sensitive electronics.

produk.nama: HR33 Series Rack Online UPS (10–25 kVA)

tipe.nama: HR33 Series Rack Online UPS (10–25 kVA)

judul.teks1: Rack-mount UPS for modern data centers. Offers flexible configuration (3/3 or 3/1), touch LCD display, and advanced battery charging management.

produk.nama: HR11 Series Rack Online UPS (1–10 kVA)

tipe.nama: HR11 Series Rack Online UPS (1–10 kVA)

judul.teks1: Compact double-conversion UPS with high power density and DSP control. Provides reliable power protection for servers, IT systems, and office equipment.
Cost-effective UPS with automatic voltage regulation and surge protection. Ideal for home offices, PCs, and small devices.
